sentences.en: Barbara White and her mother like to listen to music together, though their tastes don't harmonize.
sentences.cn: 尽管芭芭拉·怀特和她的母亲音乐品味不太一致，她们还是喜欢一起听音乐。

sentences.en: Do these colours go well together ( ie harmonize with each other )?
sentences.cn: 这些颜色配在一起协调 吗 ?

sentences.en: His conduct does not harmonize with his preaching.
sentences.cn: 他的行为与他的说教不一致.

sentences.en: His temperament does not harmonize with a slow, even pace of life.
sentences.cn: 他的气质与慢而单调的生活节奏不谐调.

sentences.en: How well all her garments harmonized with each other.
sentences.cn: 她所有的衣服彼此配起来是多么地协调。

sentences.en: It would be sensible if we could harmonize our plans ( with yours ).
sentences.cn: 假定我们能使自己的计画 ( 与你们的 ) 协调起来,那就切合实际了.

sentences.en: It would be sensible if we could harmonize our plans.
sentences.cn: 假定我们能使自己的计画协调起来,那就切合实际了.

sentences.en: Let him leave the house, if he imagines he will not harmonize with its young mistress.
sentences.cn: 如果他认为他不能与府第的年轻女主人和睦相处,让他离开府第好了.

sentences.en: Miss Keeldar and her uncle had characters that would not harmonize - that never had harmonized.
sentences.cn: 基达尔小姐和她的姑夫具有合不来拍 —— 永远也合不来拍的性格.

sentences.en: The colors don't seem to harmonize.
sentences.cn: 这些色彩看起来一点也不谐调.

sentences.en: The colours do not seem to harmonize with each other at all.
sentences.cn: 这些颜色显得一点也不协调。

sentences.en: The new building does not harmonize with its surroundings.
sentences.cn: 那栋新楼与周围环境不协调。

sentences.en: the proposal to harmonize tax levels throughout the EU
sentences.cn: 统一欧盟税率水平的提议

sentences.en: The singing teacher taught us to harmonize this song.
sentences.cn: 音乐教师教我们用和声演唱这首歌.

sentences.en: The singing teacher teaches them to harmonize the new song.
sentences.cn: 声乐老师教他们用和声唱那首新歌.

sentences.en: Warm accents harmonize with the neutral - tone of the furniture in the house.
sentences.cn: 在屋子里家具的暖色符号和中间色调相互协调.

sentences.en: Where willows harmonize the wind And green hills lighten the cares of the world.
sentences.cn: 杨柳散和风,青山澹吾虑.

words.tran_cn: 和谐的，和睦的；协调的；悦耳的
和声学；泛音；数律分析法
使和谐；使一致；以和声唱

trans.tran_cn: 使和谐；使一致；以和声唱
trans.tran_en: if two or more things harmonize, they work well together or look good together

trans.tran_cn: 和谐，以和声演奏或歌唱
